channel.title: Which is Better Apples or Oranges?
channel.description:
Well hard choice for me Because I like them both. Note: We are not taking on board nutritional value. They are both good for you. And also no statistics here, This is a discussion purely on opinions.
Answer all these Questions in your reply and then make a Total on this post.
Current Grand Totals Apples: 2 Oranges: 2
[code]Which tastes better: (Apples/Oranges) Which is cheaper to buy (In your area): (Apples/Oranges) Which is easier to prepare before eating: (Apples/Oranges) [This will be oranges if you peel your apples lol] Which do you eat more of: (Apples/Oranges)
Totals Apples: (0-4) Oranges: (0-4)[/code]
I think
Which tastes better: Oranges Which is cheaper to buy (In your area): Apples Which is easier to prepare before eating: Apples Which do you eat more of: Oranges
Totals Apples: 2 Oranges: 2
Im going to Tally all totals and after a week I'll see which is better :)

item.title: Which is Better Apples or Oranges?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“Mattymat1313, post:11, topic:125309”]oranges!! yes they are messier but i really like them when they are 3/4 frozen. they are sooo good that way ;D[/quote]Messy…?

Which tastes better: Green Apples
Which is cheaper to buy (In your area): Apples
Which is easier to prepare before eating: Depends how I want to eat them. (eg. Cook, peal, ect)
Which do you eat more of: Apples

Totals
Apples: 3
Oranges: 0
Both: 1

Read full topic
item.source: Which is Better Apples or Oranges?
